      • createClockin

        @RequestMapping(value="employee/{id}/clockin",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createClockin(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Long employeeId,
                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.web.util.UriComponentsBuilder ucBuilder)
        Save a new a timestamp to a specific employee.
        Parameters:
        employeeId: - Employee identifier (primary key).
        ucBuilder: - Assing the url to find the new timestamp in header, If save with sucess.

      • dailyReport

        @RequestMapping(value="employee/{id}/clockin/dailyreport/{datetime}",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> dailyReport(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Long employeeId,
                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable(value="datetime") @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM-dd")
                                                                                                                                                                  java.util.Date inputDate,
                                                                                                                                                                  org.springframework.web.util.UriComponentsBuilder ucBuilder)
        Retrieve daily report to a specific employee.
        Parameters:
        employeeId: - Employee identifier (foreign key).
        inputDate: - Target data of daily report. Format: yyyy-MM-dd.

      • monthlyReport

        @RequestMapping(value="employee/{id}/clockin/monthlyreport/year/{year}/month/{monthCode}",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> monthlyReport(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Long employeeId,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="year")
                                                                                                                                                                                         int year,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="monthCode")
                                                                                                                                                                                         int monthCode,
                                                                                                                                                                                         org.springframework.web.util.UriComponentsBuilder ucBuilder)
        Retrieve monthly report to a specific employee.
        Parameters:
        employeeId: - Employee identifier (foreign key).
        year: - Target year of monthly report. Range 1970 until current year.
        monthCode: - Target month of monthly report. Possible values: 1 – January 2 – February 3 – March 4 – April 5 – May 6 – June 7 – July 8 – August 9 – September 10 – October 11 – November 12 – December
